data.Title: Zoya Dadarka’s Blog
data.AuthorDescription: A style and beauty enthusiast, I also love exploring new places, cuisines and cultures. In my free time you will find me watching reruns of Gossip Girl or blogging about anything that catches my eye.

items.title: Perfect palettes to light up your summer
items.subTitle: It’s that time of the year when it’s sunny and bright outside, flowers are abloom and colours seem a lot
